title: Could Bengals trade top pick? More Disrespected: 49ers or Packers? (Football 1/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Danny Kanell to discuss the small possibility of the Bengals listening to offers for the No. 1 pick as other teams desperately try to target Joe Burrow (4:40). The guys explore if the Panthers are a potential trade partner for Cincy. Will and Danny also discuss several storylines heading into this weekend's conference championships including the more disrespected team between the 49ers and Packers (19:30), Aaron Rodgers' legacy (27:30) and Ryan Tannehill's resurgence (32:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
